description: An ordinary high-school student by day, by night she is an exorcist who partners her older sister to resolve exorcism commissions assigned by the Church. She underwent martial arts training together with her childhood friend Touma. During exorcisms, her sister suppresses the demon using a combination of relics and innate spiritual ability so that Setsuna can attack the exposed demon with melee attacks enhanced by innate spiritual power.
name: Shindou Setsuna
